information: The company GIFFARD & CIE, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1954, which operates in the Liquors and spirits industry. It also operates in the non-alcoholic fruit syrups, flavoured cordials, syrups, and creme liqueurs industries. It is based in Avrillé, France.
